member.postal_address: Office 801, 47A Evelpidon & 33 Lefkados Str., GR-113 62 Athens, Greece

shortcv.p: Elpida Prasopoulou is PhD candidate in the Department of Management Science and Technology at the Athens University of Economics and Business (AUEB). In 1999 she graduated first from the Department of Public Administration at the Panteion University of Political and Social Sciences with a specialization in Economics. She also holds a MBA degree awarded jointly in 2001 from the National Technical University of Athens and Athens University of Economics and Business. From 1999 until 2000 she worked as assistant accountant. From 2001 until today she works as a research officer in eLTRUN. She has participated in several research projects funded by the European Union (EU). She currently acts as project manager for AUEB in Guide (IST-2002-2.3.1.9), an Integrated Project funded by the E.U. Her main research interests focus on ANT, sensemaking, time in organizational theory and inter-organizational networks.
